sense.def:
To vouch for someone
pomeni zagotavljati, da se bo tista oseba primerno vedla in podpirala določeno skupino ljudi ali določena prizadevanja.

seg.quote: He said that he could vouch for your discretion.
I was vouched for by the Tattaglia family.

sense.def:
To vouch for something
pomeni imeti dokaze na podlagi osebne izkušnje za to, da je nekaj res ali pravilno.

seg.quote: I can vouch for the accuracy of my information.
